data.suggestion: Nora tries out a vixen shape. She is bending over, tail high up and looking back at Trace asking "Does this tail makes my butt look big?". Trace is not impressed.
Sexy tavern maiden competition: Adira and Maren compete to see who is the better tavern maiden! Karen protects Maeve's innocent eyes.
Evals begs advice from a pleased but exhausted looking Mike as he adds yet another entry into his little black book.
Keith on clarinet and Natani on alto sax playing a beautiful duet
After a talk about their failures with men, Kat convinces Nora to pretend to be Keith for her in the dreamscape.
Maeve and Maddie swimming in the manor pool, or the beach
Flora and Kat in the “Human Only” bath much to the surprise of ( Human ) Raine and Maren!
Zen in an Indiana Jones outfit that Kat tailored for him
What if Laura was Grand Templar instead of Trace?
Maybe a big dance party featuring the main cast?
Cathleen telling Cornelius she’s pregnant
Trace wades through water carrying Flora to keep her fur dry
Flora running around through town with the TF gun from Addictive Science zapping everyone into half-keidrans and keidrans while laughing maniacally.
Kat dancing on some fields on a moonlit night; inksplotch tyle
Karen, ever excited and eager to change herself, meets Nora
Saria and Fiona kissing Trace on his cheeks
Love Talk part 2. Kat asks Nora about her relationship with Trace: "I heard you tried to seduce him. Are you in love with him?" Nora explains how actually she relates to him.
Female Mike Reference Sheet
Maren has a dream/nightmare about getting married to Sythe
Natani discovers Zen and Kat napping together and decides to embarrass them both
Remake of FemMike showing his heartbutt from page 454
In the AU where Natani and Zen live in the Basitin islands, young Natani and Keith meet for the first time. Keith bashfully offers Natani a flower who bashfully accepts it.
Body Swap Shenanigans continued: After swapping bodies with Nibbly, Maren swaps with Scythe, but Nibbly doesn't notice.
Nora teaching Reni and Kat on how to win over a human heart and Red blurts out how Nora never won over Trace, embarrassing Nora.
A Snow Leopard Keidran exploring human cities as he studies the humans in their natural habitat.
Redraw Flora lying sideways in bed looking at the viewer. I think the original was called 'good morning Flora'
Maren looks incredibly disturbed when she finds Nibbly reading a book. The book's title? "How to Get Away with Murder for Squirrels"
Our explorer cosplaying as Hange Zöe from Attack on Titan (last sketch in artic they look like them)
A poodle keidran wants to give Natani a haircut
A Keidran slave market, Eric's parents are purchasing Evals, but a young Eric wants Mike too.
Sythe’s thoughts on maren
Kat removes clothes from her puppets to make way for new outfits. Meanwhile in the Oasis Room some people on the beach suddenly feel compelled to get naked.
Mike as an old mountain sage giving "wisdom" to passing pilgrims.
Zen and Raine camping on a tropical beach under a star filled night sky.
Laura as Yuna and Lady Nora as Valefor in “I can fly” scene from Final Fantasy X
[Sequel] After dinner in Vixen & Vixen, Maren walks Raine home. Wolf girl still isn't sure if it was a date and if she should give Maren a goodbye kiss.
Adelaide and Maddie's Father: Forbidden First Date Edition. Maddie's father sneaks his way into the castle to see Adelaide
Kathrin wearing a dress, standing in Marilyn Monroe's famous pose from 'The Seven Year Itch'.
Sealeen chairing a meeting of the 'Trace fanclub'.
TK characters as Fellowship of the Ring.
Trace tiger
Brutus gets a full view of Clovis' treacherous tail
Laura spots a hen house. Her fox instincts kick in.
Flora and Trace getting married (Sort of a sequel to the Flora in a wedding dress picture from the art book) or Trace is his groom outfit
Red and Raine sitting side be side with her leaning into him at the campfire
Natani dressed as Shantae and Keith dressed as Bolo
AU where Natani is a punk rock star with a devil may care attitude, and Kat is a fan asking for autographs.
Sam and Colin are subjected to a species swap. Colin is understandably flustered, but Sam is enjoying the change.
Natani wearing the Infinity Gauntlet and she's about to snap her fingers.
Page 217 Redux
Wolfernatural: Natani and Zen as Sam and Dean Winchester from the Supernatural TV series respectively.
Puppy Evals plays with other puppies in the dog clan's village.
Tigress Trace in a Maid outfit
Wrip and Vinkle from Betsy Lee’s No Evil, meeting Keith and Natani
Older Maeve and Maddie share their first kiss. Maddie gets extremely flustered afterwards.
After waking from a terrible nightmare, Trace holds his sleeping fiancée in his arms, whispering a promise into her ear: that he'll never let anyone hurt them. Not even himself.
Eris is traveling to catch several critters to fulfill their frankenstein project. But she has to be careful how she was not allowed to get caught by the Templars back then (part 1)
Good Boy Brutus laying under the summer sun. It can be under a tree, or in a field or garden. Something nice.
Adelaide and Natani joyfully sparring.
WWII: Tigress Trace in a US Army Air Force Dress Uniform Sitting on the wings of a P-40
Sequel to Exploring Tiger Lands: the explorers arrive at a Tiger village and are welcomed by the locals
Kat in a Maid outfit
Keidranized Okami Amaterasu
Laura being cute and snuggling a giant Basitin plushie that in no way looks like Keith.
Kat and Eric on date
Sythe and Maren share a pizza and reminisce about the first time they met!
Trace as a snake oil salesman selling transformation potions.
Cat Maren chasing Nibbly in to tree
Laura in the coast guard
The awkward moment when Kei realizes that the dog he’s been petting is actually Princess Reni, who was too embarrassed/nervous to say anything.
Cat Keidran Maren in an even more provocative maid outfit. Sythe is amused.
Flora spa time
Raine and Red (Both Halfkind forms) share a heartwarming kiss beneath a waterfall.
Natani wears the pants in their relationship by stealing Keith's.
Adelaide demolishing a tower by lifting it
The Cartographers and Tigress Noble end up at the Minor Feline territory meeting friendly Feline Keidran. Some are very curious of the Humans
Raine/Rose AU: Saria and Rose take young Raine to a library for the first time.
Oblivious Overwatch: Keith and Natani are on a mission and need covering fire, but the weapon is too big for sniper Madelyn and spotter Maeve is distracted by a butterfly
The assassin brothers in Assassin’s Creed style.
Natani comforting Keith after a nightmare
Trace and Flora getting ready for college in a coed school for humans and keidran
Maid Clovis and cat maid Nora
Saria and Trace's child playing with Rose
Sythe teaches a nervous Keidran Ms. Nibbly to walk.
Trace dressed as Tanjiro and flora dressed as his sister from the anime demon slayer
The northern Basitin guard realizes he loves being hugged
Zen and Nat as the Elrich brothers from full metal alchemist
A very drunk Natani sticking out the top of a party limo holding a bottle of vodka, in the Las Vegas night.
